name: Focus Punch
description: When activating this move, you spend your action focusing your next attack. If you keep concentration, as an action on your next turn, make an attack roll against a creature, doing 3d8 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 5d6 at level 5, 4d12 at level 10, and 8d8 at level 17.
